medical_history.chief_complaint: RLQ abdominal pain for one day.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began as periumbilical abdominal pain and nausea in the afternoon after feeling well in the morning. The pain gradually worsened and migrated to the RLQ, where it has persisted. The patient experienced a small amount of diarrhea today.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. asthma 2. sinusitis 3. GERD 4. hypertension 5. osteoarthritis of the neck and shoulders 6. sleep apnea (on CPAP) 7. fatty liver (by ultrasound) 8. eczema 9. borderline type 2 diabetes with elevated hemoglobin A1c of 6.2%.
medical_history.family_history: Mother (living) - colon cancer, stroke, arthritis; Sister - breast cancer; Sister (living) - thyroid disease.
